oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Hollywood Barn Dance - Unknown date - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS program The Hollywood Barn Dance, unknown date (circa 1946), part 2. Featuring CBS announcer Tom Hanlon, host Cottonseed Clark, and performers Foy Willing and the Riders of the Purple Sage, Merle Travis, Colleen Summers (Mary Ford), Jerry Hilliard, Leo Carrillo, Tex Atchison, Deuce Spriggins and his Western Swing Band, the Sunshine Girls (Colleen Summers, Vivian Earles, 'Carol' (likely Colleen's sister, unconfirmed)), and Johnny Bond. Held at the Western Palisades Ballroom on the Santa Monica Pier.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tex Atchison; Deuce Spriggins; Western Swing Band (Deuce Spriggins); Sunshine Girls; Johnny Bond; Cottonseed Clark; Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified fiddle tune with calls] (Tex Atchison fiddle) [continued from part 1] -- Cottonseed Clark talks -- Columbus Stockade Blues (Deuce Spriggins and his Western Swing Band) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces the Sunshine Girls -- You Are My Sunshine (The Sunshine Girls) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Johnny Bond -- Comedy routine (Johnny Bond, Cottonseed Clark) -- When The Bloom Is On The Sage (Johnny Bond) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Detour (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces the next song -- At The Rainbow's End (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Closing statement (Cottonseed Clark) -- Theme -- Announcer opening statement for following program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; Hollywood barn dance (Radio program); Hanlon, Tom, 1907-1970; Clark, Cottonseed; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Travis, Merle; Ford, Mary, 1924-1977; Hilliard, Jerry, 1918-2010; Carrillo, Leo; Atchison, Tex; Spriggins, Deuce; Sunshine Girls (Musical group); Bond, Johnny, 1915-1978
